movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest tests.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson through the eyes of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the task of planting an idea.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.title: Goodfellas
movies.description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring.

reviews.comment: An absolute masterpiece! The storytelling is phenomenal and the character development is second to none.
Great cinematography and powerful performances. A must-watch classic.
Coppola's direction is flawless. One of the greatest films ever made.
Heath Ledger's Joker is iconic. This movie redefined superhero films.
Mind-bending plot and incredible visual effects. Nolan at his best!
Epic fantasy adventure that started it all. Perfect adaptation of Tolkien's work.
